UserStreak.title: UserStreak
UserStreak.description: Represents a user's streak data for tracking daily engagement.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with this streak.

currentStreak.description: The user's current streak in days.

longestStreak.description: The user's longest streak ever achieved in days.

lastActiveDate.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the user's last recorded activity.

PerformanceReview.title: PerformanceReview
PerformanceReview.description: Stores a user's performance review, either a self-assessment or manager feedback.

userId.description: The ID of the user being reviewed.

reviewerId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the review was submitted.

/userStreaks/{userStreakId}.description: Stores individual user streak data. The document ID should be the same as the user's UID for easy lookup.
